Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Cleric[/b] | Whenever you activate an ability that isn't a mana ability, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
[b]Warrior[/b] | {T}: Untap target basic land.
